title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Team-Based Online Mathematics Course Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating basic online learning platforms, foundational knowledge in secondary mathematics education
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Through team collaboration, learners can clearly define learning objectives for online math courses and systematically align content with assessment tools.
Applying the Backward Design methodology, learners can systematically develop teaching-learning activities for online math courses.
Learners can continuously monitor learning effectiveness and design feedback routines using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
